EmailTemplate.name: HEVT-202307-xSEG-FRM-FORUM-REGISTRATION.01. Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for registering for Forum
EmailTemplate.textOnly: July 17 – 19, 2023 | Boston, MA Thank you for registering We look forward to welcoming you—along with hundreds of other people working to advance virtual care—to Forum 2023. Add it to your calendar here <[[https://go1.teladochealth.com/rs/138-DRH-707/images/Teladoc Health Forum 2023.ics]]>. If you’ll be traveling to Boston, make sure you reserve your room at the Omni Boston Hotel <[[https://www.omnihotels.com/hotels/boston-seaport/meetings/teladoc-health-07162023]]> at the Seaport before June 15 to get our discounted rate of $299. Visit the Forum website <[[https://forum.teladochealth.com/]]> for updates to the agenda as the event grows closer. Questions about your registration? Email forum@teladochealth.com <[[mailto:forum@teladochealth.com]]>. See you in Boston! About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals. Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> | Privacy <[[https://www.teladochealth.com/legal/privacy-policy]]> | Legal notice <[[https://www.teladochealth.com/legal/legal-disclaimer]]> © Teladoc Health, Inc. All rights reserved. 2 Manhattanville Road, Purchase NY, 10577.
